items.sentence: We were supposed to help Tom yesterday afternoon.

The cough syrup that Tom recommended worked well.
The food at that restaurant is too greasy for me.
The old woman climbed the stairs with difficulty.
All five rabbits were eaten by the hungry wolves.

Anything that is too stupid to be spoken is sung.

Tom certainly isn\'t as smart as he thinks he is.

I\'ve got more money than I know what to do with.
